title: OriDam tharayO
sahitya:
OriDam tArAyO paramA 



anupallavi



pOriDum koL poi porAmait-tollaiyaip-puNNiyar pOTriDum ponnAna tillai

manril



caraNam



tannalap-puligaLum tantira narigaLum ponnaDiyArgaLum pozhudai

vINAkkAmal

unnaDiyAruDan unakkE nAn ALAgi un pughazhE pADi anbu sheidu inburavE
